title: Military Justice
content:encoded:
May 2, 2016 / Episode scoring music by Alex Fitch, AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Chris Zabriskie, Julian Sartorius, and Uncanny Valleys

Colin and Susan interview James Weirick of the Task and Purpose podcast, which reviewed Season 2 of the Serial podcast on Bowe Bergdahl from a military perspective.

You can listen to Task and Purpose at http://taskandpurpose.com/podcasts/
